segment.source: Set how long a speech recognizer ignores silence or unrecognizable sounds (babble) and continues listening for speech input.
segment.target: Set how long a speech recognizer ignores silence or unrecognizable sounds (babble) and continues listening for speech input.

segment.source: Set how long a speech recognizer ignores silence or unrecognizable sounds (babble) and continues listening for speech input.
segment.target: Set how long a speech recognizer ignores silence or unrecognizable sounds (babble) and continues listening for speech input.

segment.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
segment.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

segment.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive \]
segment.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive \]

segment.source: Here, we specify various Timeouts values:
segment.target: Here, we specify various Timeouts values:

segment.source: InitialSilenceTimeout - The length of time that a SpeechRecognizer detects silence (before any recognition results have been generated) and assumes speech input is not forthcoming.
segment.target: InitialSilenceTimeout - The length of time that a SpeechRecognizer detects silence (before any recognition results have been generated) and assumes speech input is not forthcoming.

segment.source: BabbleTimeout - The length of time that a SpeechRecognizer continues to listen to unrecognizable sounds (babble) before it assumes speech input has ended and finalizes the recognition operation.
segment.target: BabbleTimeout - The length of time that a SpeechRecognizer continues to listen to unrecognizable sounds (babble) before it assumes speech input has ended and finalizes the recognition operation.

segment.source: EndSilenceTimeout - The length of time that a SpeechRecognizer detects silence (after recognition results have been generated) and assumes speech input has ended.
segment.target: EndSilenceTimeout - The length of time that a SpeechRecognizer detects silence (after recognition results have been generated) and assumes speech input has ended.

segment.source: Note Timeouts can be set on a per-recognizer basis.
segment.target: Note Timeouts can be set on a per-recognizer basis.
